topic.title: Tor meek bridges for tracker connections
topic.body:
Hello everybody ! I am looking for some help as I am a new user of Zeronet and facing some problems when I want to get some sites. I have this message : "Use Tor meek bridges for tracker connections
No meek bridge support in your client, please download the latest bundle." I think that I have the last version as I have just began to use zeronet a week ago. But I have tried to reinstall everything in a new directory without success with the bridge problem. Another problem : I have imported in this new install the users.json file with my zeroid id inside but I have lost access to this zeroid identification ! Hopefully having a backup of the firs install I was able to go back to a working version but with the bridges problem not resolved. Somebody have an advice ? Thanks in advance.

1633896629_1BFxHVXHTKcnWLWPVKbTknZTAaiHz.body: Thanks for giving these two informations. But I was not able to retrieve the full pdfs of these publications because I am not member of any of the publications web sites. Do you have a copy ? Thanks in advance.
Thanks to @anonymuslogin and @robione for the pdfs !

1633895520_1BFxHVXHTKcnWLWPVKbTknZTAaiHz.body: Thanks to anonymuslogin and robione for the pdfs !
